title: Bonus IP: Join Us & get 300% Bonus IP!
body:
Hey guys and gals just thought I'd let the fellow LoL players of Oceania know I will be running & organising a group of five friendly players to play as a team in regards to the bonus IP weekend. Only rules i ask is you must be willing to lose or win, play any role, and most importantly have fun!  If you are interested add me in-game and I will invite you to the next available  game, or redirect you to additional players who are willing to do the same.
Username: FusionPredz

replies.body:
Love to join in when I can play :D 
IGN: Eximiusprime

Would love to join.
If the group is happy to try new things.. not follow the meta most times

>Username: FusionPredz

Really? i had no idea.
